item.title: the World According to Girl coming to PS5, PS4 on December 25
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/the-world-according-to-girl-coming-to-ps5-ps4-on-december-25

  • PS4
  • PS5

Roguelike deckbuilder currently available for Xbox, Switch, and PC.

Publisher Amata Games and developer yondray will release roguelike deckbuilder the World According to Girl for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on December 25, the companies announced. It will support English, Japanese, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Simplified Chinese, and Traditional Chinese language options.

the World According to Girl first launched for PC via Steam on February 22, 2022, followed by Xbox series, Xbox One, and Switch on February 15, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

“A game about turning an ordinary girl into the savior of the world.”

the World According to Girl is a combination of a deck-building roguelike and a caring game in which you take on the role of an administrator in order to nurture a girl into a savior.

Examples of “Human Resources (Card) Effects”:

  • This season, gain +1 cost
  • All entertainers give +2 to a status of 1 or higher
  • Call for random emergency or surprise.

Spend six seasons (turns) a year, seven years in all (42 turns total) to raise the girl and develop a true savior.

At the end of the year, a dialogue (battle) with the Inquisitor, who measures the girl’s abilities, awaits you. Use the girl’s abilities and the memories you’ve nurtured to win the continuation of the “plan.”

And the ending of the story changes with the girl’s abilities. Watch the girl and the world go on until the end.

Story

The story takes place over 100 years in the future.

The world is on the verge of collapse.

Humanity has planned a rescue mission to outer space in the only spaceship left.

It needed to be the best people in the world to board it.

The world poured everything it had into raising a single girl.

item.title: SUCCESS Corporation announces mystery visual novel GHOST TRAVELER: Adventures in Edo for Switch, PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/success-corporation-announces-mystery-visual-novel-ghost-traveler-adventures-in-edo-for-switch-pc

  • PC
  • Switch

Due out in 2025.

SUCCESS Corporation has announced mystery visual novel GHOST TRAVELER: Adventures in Edo for Switch and PC (Steam). It will launch digitally in 2025 with English, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese language support.

Here is the story synopsis, via its official website:

A boy is transported back in time to Edo period Japan and becomes caught up in a series of bizarre murders. Will he be able to solve the mysteries surrounding the murders in the Yoshiwara red light district and return to the present day?

The protagonist (the player) is a 17-year-old boy named Kotaro, who lives in modern-day Japan. One day, he is caught up in a supernatural phenomenon in Shibuya and loses consciousness. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a world that looks like something out of a Japanese period drama.

Kotaro is told by “God” that he is in the Yoshiwara red light district in Edo, the capital of 19th-century Japan, that his body is dead and he now exists only as a soul, and that he has been transported back in time to the Edo period. The reasons for his arrival in this era and how he can move on to the afterlife are unclear, so Kotaro begins wandering the streets of Yoshiwara in search of clues to solve the “mystery.”

Eventually, he stumbles upon the murder of a courtesan and takes on the role of a “detective” to solve the case. However, he is soon confronted with a series of bizarre murders…
